sentences.en: A number of beaches in the region have been polluted by sewage pumped into the Irish Sea.
sentences.cn: 这一地区的一些海滩已被排放到爱尔兰海的污水污染了。

sentences.en: Chlorine is used in sewage treatment.
Cities upstream use the river to get rid of sewage.
sentences.cn: 上游的城市将污水排放到河里。

sentences.en: It requires of us great efforts to clarify sewage in cities.
sentences.cn: 净化城市的污水需要我们很大的努力.

sentences.en: Sewage nutrients do increase algal growth in the harbour.
sentences.cn: 污水中的营养物确实会加快港口的海藻生长。
然而, 污水则有所不同.

sentences.en: Stream standards refer to quality of receiving water downstream from the origin of sewage discharge.
sentences.cn: 水体标准是指污水排放点下游的受纳水体的水质.

sentences.en: That won't flush out all the sewage, but it should unclog some stinking drains.
sentences.cn: 那样做虽不能将污物全部冲掉，但应该能疏通一些散发恶臭的排水管。

sentences.en: The dilution of the textile wastes by domestic sewage weakens the concentration of the former.
sentences.cn: 由于生活污水的稀释作用,降低了纺织废水的浓度.

sentences.en: The factory secretly dumped millions of gallons of raw sewage (= sewage that had not been treated ) into the Ohio river.
sentences.cn: 这家工厂偷偷地把几百万加仑未经处理的污水排放进了俄亥俄河。

sentences.en: The intense currents disperse the sewage.
The pathogen load of a given sewage varies from one community to the other.
sentences.cn: 污水中的病原体含量因不同的社区而异.

sentences.en: The pipe disgorges sewage into the sea.
sentences.cn: 这管道将污水排入大海。

sentences.en: The sewage reticulation system is used everywhere.
sentences.cn: 网状污水渠系统无处不在。

sentences.en: The sewers collected sewage and storm runoff and discharged it, untreated, into the harbour.
sentences.cn: 污水和暴雨径流汇入下水道后被直接排入海港。

sentences.en: This sewage - consuming biological process depends on a closely intorrelated succession of species of animal plankton.
sentences.cn: 这种污水的生物净化过程就依赖着浮游动物种类的一种密切相关的演替.

sentences.en: Thousands of tons of filth and sewage pour into the Ganges every day.
sentences.cn: 每天都有成千上万吨污物和废水排入恒河。

words.tran_cn: 为…铺设污水管道；用下水道排除…的污水

phrases.tran_cn: 未经处理的污水，未经净化的污水；原污水
n. 污水污泥；下水污泥

trans.tran_cn: （下水道里的）污物，下水道，污水
trans.tran_en: the mixture of waste from the human body and used water, that is carried away from houses by pipes under the ground
